text: 14.27: Zo 14.1; 16.33; Fi 4.7; Kor 3.15Gu nde thamtha za mbuav, gu ndava mɨɨtɨgar nde ndɨɨi, ana nde phorgɨ kɨri. Gu won ndava mɨɨtɨk ma, gu ana nde ndɨɨi. Gu nde ndɨɨi ndava mɨɨtɨk, ana kha nuianan gumgi gu mbigi ndɨɨi ndava mɨɨtɨga fara muuŋgi fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrver muuŋv, ndavi simɨv, rɨvɨ thari.
